response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer this exceptional item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a product that holds significant value to you, while also allowing us to maximize its worth. We believe this offer strikes a fair balance between our interests and your perceived value of the product. We look forward to hearing your response and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 950000}
